Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Deep garnet color. Luxurious and dynamic aromas of ripe strawberry, bright cherry and faint notes of spicy oak and vanilla. The complexity of the palate smoothly layers rich red currant notes and baking spice flavors with light smoke, earth and leather. A balanced, velvety texture and supple tannins carry the wine through to a lingering, succulent finish. Meiomi Pinot Noir is a renowned wine that has gained popularity for its rich and complex flavor profile. Produced by Meiomi Wines, this Pinot Noir is known for its vibrant red fruit flavors, balanced acidity, and velvety texture. It hails from California's coastal regions, which include Monterey County, Santa Barbara County, and Sonoma County. The unique combination of grapes from these diverse terroirs contributes to Meiomi's distinct character. One of the notable features of Meiomi Pinot Noir, as highlighted by Vivino's reviews, is its captivating aroma. Many reviewers mention the wine's enticing bouquet of ripe cherries, strawberries, and subtle hints of vanilla and oak. This aromatic complexity sets the stage for a delightful tasting experience. In conclusion, Meiomi Pinot Noir is a celebrated wine with a strong presence in the world of Pinot Noir enthusiasts.

Name: Red Blend
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Edizione Cinque Autoctoni
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Aromas of blackberry, boysenberry, cigar box, toffee and mint lead to fresh dark berry and red currant flavors and hints of dried herbs. The palate is soft and inviting, and the finish offers lingering notes of fruit, caramel and almond. Black cherry and raspberry jam aromas, as well as more subtle notes of nutmeg, spice and chocolate. On the palate, lovely layers of raspberry and plum are supported by excellent structure and seamlessly integrated oak.

Name: Bourgogne Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Harmonious and balanced, with a plump fruitiness and silky texture offset by round, gentle tannins in a wine of medium body and elegant structure. The very typical, fragrant varietal bouquet is complemented by a deliciously lingering finish.

Name: The Banished Dark Red
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon Lot
Wine Description: N/A

Name: The Uprising Red
Wine Description: The nose has intense lifted mocha, caramel and baking spice notes. On the palate the wine is full and mouth coating with brown sugar, jammy blackberry and chocolate notes.

Name: Saldo Zinfandel
Wine Description: This ruby red Zinfandel blend represents the very best lots of grapes from vineyards all across Northern California. Bold in its dark berry aroma and laced with hints of cardamom and fall spices, its finish has persistent notes of chocolate and rich coffee bean.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Aromas of black cherry, plum and violets, followed by subtle flavors of strawberry and allspice. Firm yet supple tannins finish off this approachable fruit-driven Cabernet Sauvignon, making it ideal for a variety of food pairings.

Name: Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: La Fiole du Pape Père Anselme Châteauneuf-du-Pape
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Saint-Julien (Grand Cru Classé)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Dairyman Vineyard Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Bright crimson red in color. Aromas of black cherry and ripe plums combine with subtle notes of dried herbs and smoke. The palate entry shows flavors of cranberry, fresh raspberry, and ripe cherry, complemented by hints of vanilla and baking spice. A balance of savory, cedar and cocoa powder, and sweet, fig jam and ripe blackberry, round out the mouth-feel.

Name: Réserve (de la Comtesse) Pauillac
Winery: Château Pichon Longueville Comtesse de Lalande
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Saint-Julien
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Margaux (Grand Cru Classé)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Vinum Italicum No 3 Opera
Wine Description: Created to celebrate Italian grapes, this wine, with a 15% alcohol, has great strength and a balanced and persistent taste. We suggest to pair this wine particularly with stewed, grilled and roast meat. Also perfect with very mature cheeses. In order to best appreciate it, we suggest to uncork an hour before serving and drink at room temperature, 18-20°C.

Name: Three Valleys
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Signature Brioso
Wine Description: “The creation of my wines at Susana Balbo Wines is to me the maximum achievement as a winemaker, product of all my efforts and many years of hard work. I could say that the winery is like my third child, a dream come true.” Susana Balbo To create her wines, Susana Balbo combines the “knowledge of the terroir" & "winemaking skills". The art of blending is, according to Susana, the expression of the winemaker’s top talent. A way to show the ability to play with different aromas and flavors obtained from different terroirs, as does a painter with his palette.

Name: Sarget de Gruaud Larose Saint-Julien
Wine Description: Lovely deep ruby appearance with purple hints. The nose shows aromas of red fruits, fresh cherry, raspberry, light spices. Lots of freshness in the mouth. Fine balance with a great finish.

Name: Haut-Médoc (Grand Cru Classé)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Medium-deep garnet color, with a dark core. The wine is refined, with clear notes of spice, rose, black cherry, plum, and sweet red fruits, all wrapped in an earthiness that lends a surprising rustic touch. On the palate, the aromatics follow through with layered spice, white pepper, dark cherry and black berry, framed by youthful tannins. The finish is long and the texture has real depth.

Name: Whole Cluster Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Deep ruby in color with lively aromas of bing cherry, blackberry, baking spices and a hint of cocoa and earth. A vibrant entry and juicy mid-palate features flavors that mirror aromas with the addition of strawberry purée and raspberry fruit leather. A well-rounded and plush finish, accented by bright acidity.

Name: Red Blend
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Rosso Dolce – Sweet Red
Wine Description: Light ruby red semi sparkling wine with intense blackberry, violet and berry aromas; crisp, lively palate with persistent aftertaste, fruity and deliciously smooth.

Name: La Dame de Montrose Saint-Estèphe
Wine Description: It has a silky robe with a beautiful cherry red colour. The nose is very expressive and concentrated, slightly sweet and woody, with a mixture of red fruit aromas, raspberry, and morello cherry. The palate is powerful and racy, combining suppleness and tight tannins. Beautiful length in the mouth, with tannins less evident in the after-taste.

Name: Big Red Blend
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Elegant aromas of plum and dark fruit alongside flavors of black fruits, red fruits and a hint of cinnamon and tobacco.

Name: Côtes du Rhône Selection Mon Coeur
Wine Description: Dark robe; blackberry, licorice, concentrated nose. Well-knit, black fruit, tannin thread along the palate that broadens well, gains some chewy tannins at the end. Good, honest drinking with some fullness, late life – has a black pepper aftertaste.

Name: Rioja Crianza
Wine Description: Color: Ruby red double layer,with appreciable tile shades thin layer due to its time in oak. Aroma: Stresses aroma for its elegance, finesse, complexity and long lasting. Taste: The taste is soft and round on the entry velvety and very pleasant sensations. Its tannin structure is elegant and very well made, excelling aftertaste for its great persistence. Recommendations: This wine especially combined with roast lamb and pork, red meat in sauces, vegetables, small game and cheeses half healing.

Name: Les Pommiers Pinot Noir
Wine Description: The EnRoute Les Pommiers has aromas of dark fruits; plum, black cherry, blackberry with underlying perfume and floral notes and a hint of mineral. The fruit follows through on the palate with blueberry and a core of creamy cherry. The mid palate is broad and layered, displaying considerably supple tannins that are balanced nicely by sweet oak and refreshing acidity.

Name: Saint-Julien (Grand Cru Classé)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Croix de Beaucaillou Saint-Julien
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Merlot
Wine Description: Deep red with great intensity. On the nose, the wine shows delicious hints of plums and herbs. This Merlot reveals hints of chocolate and spice, while integrating perfectly with the dark fruit flavors. The wine is smooth with great structure.

Name: Gran Malbec
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Pinot Noir (Monterey/Sonoma/Santa Barbara)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Echo de Lynch-Bages Pauillac
Wine Description: It displays a striking colour and an expressive nose on aromas of black fruits and spices. The attack is lively and racy and the still-fiery tannins are sure to mellow as ageing takes place in one-wine barrels.

Name: Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: The wine displays deep ruby color and rich, expressive aromas of spicy black cherry and briary blackberry, with subtle hints of cedar and mocha. With flavors of ripe black and red fruits, laced with clove and allspice, persist through the lengthy finish. Silky, ripe tannins structure the wine and contribute to the plush texture on the palate.

Name: Rosso Semi-Sweet
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Zinfandel
Wine Description: This wine has aromas of roasted plum and blackberry jam with hints of sweet spices. On the palate, the wine’s bright red fruit flavours and acidity are complemented by a soft, round mouth feel and a long finish.

Name: Estate Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Cherry garnet in color with an earthy aroma of black currants, fresh tomato and dried rose petal. A woodsy fireside note accents a juicy, full mouthful of sour cherry and plum with underlying layers of cinnamon stick and coffee bean. The silky finish persists with long, dusty tannins.

Name: Old Vine Red (OVR)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: It has a red colour with soft purplish tones. Big fruit Intensity, mainly blackberry, plum and cherry aroma on the palate, mixed with sweet notes of chocolate and mocha. Well balanced and with velvety texture. Ripe tannins, balance and structure.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Displays complex aromas of black cherry, cedar and ripe strawberries. On the palate layers of black, juicy fruit mingle with bold yet approachable tannins leading to an expansive, lingering finish.

Name: Rosso Piceno
Wine Description: Very intense ruby colour with slight grainy tones. Rich and persistent nose with a sophisticated, berry-scented bouquet revealing hints of almond extract, mint, and earth. Fresh and fruity palate that is well-structured with soft tannins, mellowed in French oak.

Name: Vasari Montepulciano d'Abruzzo
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Vint Cabernet Sauvignon Aged in Bourbon Barrels
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Black Semi-Sweet
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Diamond Collection Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Highly concentrated with aromas of blackberries, cherries and spice with flavors of plums, currants, dried herbs and toasted oak.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon (815)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: E (Spain)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: The wine is brimming with fruit aromas and flavors biased to the black fruit end of the Cabernet spectrum: plums, blackberry, and black currant. Rich and full-bodied on the palate, this Cabernet drinks well on release but will soften and develop with additional age. For those who seek youthful fresh Cabernet fruit aromas and a more structured wine, drink it from 2015 through 2019.

Name: Saint-Joseph Selection Offerus
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Reserve Malbec
Wine Description: Colour: Bright carmine red. Aromas: plum and raspberry aroma mingle elegantly with vanilla notes from the oak. Palate: well balanced, exhibits sweet tannins and a velvety finish.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Clear, bright with a medium ruby purple core and a light violet rim. An attractive mix of red and black cherry with blackcurrant, cinnamon, cocoa, cedar and purple flowers. Medium body, with a complex mix of red and black fruit and a hint of violet in the background. The finish is long and crisp, with cherry, mineral and floral components balanced by soft tannins.

Name: Côtes du Rhône Rouge
Wine Description: This dry, full-bodied and fruity red displays a complex and medium nose. On the palate, its refreshing acidity, fleshy tannins, and broad texture precede a long finish.

Name: Rouge
Wine Description: Fragrant, quite floral bouquet this year with scents of black cherries, incense and a touch of vanilla pod. The palate is medium-bodied with firm tannin, fresh in the mouth with a citrus line of acidity, slightly granular in texture towards the finish that has good structure.

Name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Grand Cru Classé)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Merlot
Wine Description: Rose petal aromas and cherry flavor, followed by smooth tannins that lead in to a vibrant finish.

Name: Barbaresco
Wine Description: This wine shows a mentholated cherry nose followed by spicy, smoky black cherry and floral notes on the slowly unfolding palate.

Name: Clos de Los Siete (by Michel Rolland)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Red Blend
Wine Description: It has sensual rose petal, rustic rhubarb earth notes and blueberry bring memories of fall. Brambly blueberry and currant preserve blend with cinammon pie crust with a slight toast on the dough.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon California
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: The nose is really pretty – lots of floral, chocolate, cherry cola, with a hint of pears and caramel. It has a dusty, earthy aroma that keeps you interested long after your glass is empty. The gorgeous aromas are echoed on the palate. The texture is super smooth, soft, and balanced. Not too much acid or tannin.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon - Merlot
Wine Description: For a super cheap wine, this is drinkable. On the nose it offers sour cherry, green pepper, herbs and heavy baking spices. The palate brings sour cherry and plum flavors that will make you pucker. But let’s not pretend there’s anything elegant about this wine.

Name: Labastide Dauzac Margaux
Wine Description: Crisp, delicate nose reveals a slightly woody character. We find notes of spices (such as pepper and cocoa) and peony.

Name: Rioja Crianza
Wine Description: Red ruby color wine with violet tones; well-balanced black fruit-balmlike flavors and vanilla. Powerful complex and silky smooth taste in the mouth.

Name: Viña Tondonia Reserva
Wine Description: Vibrant red leading slightly towards amber. Light fresh texture with notes of vanilla and dried berry aromas. Rich, very dry, smooth, developed. Firm tannins and balance.

Name: CA (California)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Belleruche Côtes-du-Rhône
Wine Description: Colour: Garnet red. Nose: Red fruit aromas, mainly Morello cherries. Mouth: aromas of red fruits (mainly morello cherries) and spices (liquorice, grey pepper).

Name: Old Vine Zinfandel
Wine Description: It has a gnarly core of rich, dark berry flavors with layers of spice, plum, pepper and vanilla balanced by light hint of toasted oak. Break out a bottle Gnarly Old Vine Zin and pair with BBQ pork ribs, moms favorite Chili or steak fajitas.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Sonoma County Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: This wine has elevated and concentrated flavors that include wild berries, plum, licorice and mocha. The full-bodied and mouth-coating feel on the palate leads to a long, graceful finish with tones of intense fruit, dried herbs and cedar inside firm structure.

Name: The Chocolate Block
Wine Description: It shows massive floral perfume with underlying redcurrant, cedar, black pepper, coriander spice and hints of Turkish Delight.

Name: Red Blend
Wine Description: Aromas of ripe blackberry, black cherry, rich dark chocolate and vanilla. Velvety flavors of blackberry and black cherry, dark chocolate with a hint of vanilla. This wine is full-bodied with rich tannins and a long finish.

Name: F (France)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Rosso di Montepulciano
Wine Description: It has lively ruby-red colour. It is winy and full of fruity fragrances. It is dry to the taste, fresh and pleasantly tannic.

Name: Malbec
Wine Description: A nice medium to fuller bodied Malbec. It is boasting dark blackberry and plum fruit flavors coupled with notes of baking spice, cocoa, toast and vanilla.

Name: Malbec Reserve
Wine Description: No acid corrections and only native yeast. Nose of violet, fresh fruit and present minerality. Not a powerful mouth impact, but rather an elegant length, mid palate, and persistence, balanced and drinkable. Chalky, caressing tannins.

Name: Tarima Hill Old Vines Monastrell
Wine Description: Red ruby. Smell of red fruits and berries, with a subtle background of grass and floral qualities. It has strong flavors of black fruits and focused. The final repeated notes of blackberry, leaving traces of pepper qualitative energetic. Long finish.

Name: Nero d'Avola
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Fronsac
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Bordeaux Supérieur
Wine Description: A firm and tannic wine, solidly built around a dry core. The blackberry juice fruit is fresh with layers of acidity to give the wine a more taut character.

Name: Reserva
Wine Description: Ruby-red colour with a golden rim. Bright and deep. Complex aromas. There is a great balance between the fruit (cherries, black plums, ripe blackberries) and the clean nuances coming from the wood (clove, pepper, vanilla and coconut). The nose is further enriched by the aromas that develop during bottle ageing. Smooth and balanced on the palate with a full, elegant feel and a long, lingering finish.

Name: Selección de Barricas
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Les Griffons Pauillac
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: The 2022 DAOU Cabernet Sauvignon exemplifies Paso Robles. The nose is highly perfumed, showing aromas of black cherry, cassis, plum, desert sage, sandalwood, and dusty minerality. Secondary aromas reveal notes of cigar box, leather, bay leaf, and black olive. The palate is rich and weighty, offering generous flavors of black raspberry, spicy currant, and blueberry compote with impressions of Bing cherry, Boysenberry, fig, and baking spices. Ripe, fine-grained tannins carry into a structured finish with lingering accents of cherry, espresso, and vanilla. Barrel Aging: 8 months in 50% new French oak

Name: Pinot Noir Willamette Valley
Wine Description: It has lively aromas of Raspberry and dark Cherry. Classic combination of fresh fruit and earthy elements. The wine’s broad mouthfeel and smooth tannins will continue to integrate as this elegant wine ages.

Name: Selección Especial
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Crianza
Wine Description: Pie Cherry, peat and smoked meat on the nose with a creamy dark berry and fruit palate. Very well balanced.

Name: Vintner's Collection Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Rioja Reserva
Wine Description: With an attractive red ruby coulour with medium-high intensity, in the nose it suprises for a powerful fruit remarkably blended with traces from its noble ageing: coconut and toffee, evolving into seductive nuances of spices and mediterranean bush.

Name: Yiron
Wine Description: Abundant aromas of wild berry, cherry and plum jam on a background of seasoned characters of vanilla, clove and toasted oak; full bodied and well balanced; long, classic finish.

Name: Nero d'Avola Sicilia Siccagno
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Valle Escondido Reserva Malbec
Wine Description: Deep purple color with aromas of red fruits, chocolate and coffebeans. Red and black cherry flavors with scents of flower. Very nice french oak on the finish, very complex and yet balanced.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Enticing aromas to the long, smooth finish. It's a blend of lush fruit with aromas of deep blackberry, currant and toasted oak. The wine has rich texture and flavours of cherry, plum and toasty vanilla. With ample fruit, good weight in the mid-palate and velvety tannins.

Name: Petit Castel
Wine Description: Lovely fresh, fruity nose. Fresh plums and violets taste. Delicious young drinking.

Name: 7 Deadly Zins Old Vine Zinfandel
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Brisa Carmenère
Wine Description: Colour: Deep red with touches of violet. Aroma: Fresh red and black fruits, spices and vanilla Flavour: Intensely fruity mild tannins and a pleasant finish.

Name: Sonoma Zinfandel
Wine Description: These vineyards are rare treasures we have farmed over the course of our family’s century as grape growers. Although “Old Vine” is often loosely interpreted in the wine industry, our benchmark is fifty years. The average age of the vines producing this wine nears 90 years.

Name: Single Vineyard Carmenère
Wine Description: Elegant and balanced. Aromas of cherries, raspberries, almonds, vanilla, coconut, spices and a light touch of cinnamon. It also has very toasty notes, elegant, which together with its large volume, persistence, power and complexity make this wine palatable and nicely integrated.

Name: Wild Thing Old Vine Zinfandel
Wine Description: Aromas of black cherry, ripe plum and raspberry fruit combine with a hint of graphite, cigar box, and vanilla-oak baking spice loveliness. smoothly textured in mouth, and the palate is very creamy and round, with a finish that is long with lush jammy fruit.

Name: Crianza
Wine Description: Dark ruby red colour. Fresh notes of red berries on the nose enriched by a depth of vanilla and sweet spice. Clean and lively on tasting with ripe tannins that blend with balanced structure. Fleshy in the mouth with delicious flavours, this is a wine for pleasure.

Name: Le Difese
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: This dry yet fruit forward Cabernet showcases lovely aromas and flavors of blackberries, red fruit, oak, and spice. Smooth tannins provide structure all the way through to the wine's delicate and expressive finish Oak, Blackberry, Red Berry, Full-bodied.

Name: Palazzo della Torre
Wine Description: It has a splendid masterpiece of Renaissance architecture now owned by the family, and produces a full-bodied red wine that has an ageing potential of at least ten years.

Name: Sta. Rita Hills Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Pomegranate, anise, and Pu-erh tea aromatics set the stage for the flavors of dried cherries, dried wild mushroom and baker’s cocoa flavors that follow. Tender and cohesive in the mouth with a very firm and savory palate impression and finish.

Name: Garnacha
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Viña Ardanza Reserva
Wine Description: Medium-high cherry red robe, with orange tinted tones on the edge of the glass, clear and brilliant. Intense and complex to the nose. Wild berry aromas predominate, blended with hints of coconut, cinnamon, tobacco and leather. Full-bodied and well structured to the palate, with silky and enveloping tannins. Long after-taste acquired from its lengthy time in bottle, where its elegant bouquet gains in intensity. This Viña Ardanza continues to evolve without losing its traditional qualities.

Name: Toko Vineyard Malbec
Wine Description: Floral notes and fresh herbs in the first, fine tannins in the following, and red berries in the last. The combination of these profiles gives more complexity to the wines.

Name: Midnight Dark Red Blend
Wine Description: N/A
